resources.string:
In this tab you are able to make a diagnosis.
Therefore you have to enter the respective patient's data, blood count and current medication.
After that you can get a diagnosis by pushing the Result button in the fourth tab. 

Do you want to see this instruction next time again?

In this tab you are able to add new diseases to the database. Therefore you have to enter the disease\'s name, its threshold values and a recommended medication for the disease. When done push the Save button at the bottom of the fourth tab. \n\nDo you want to see this instruction next time again?

In this tab you are able to enter new medication interactions to the database. Therefore you just have to enter the respective names, type of interaction and push the button on the bottom. \n\nDo you want to see this instruction next time again?
The RheinMain University of Applied Sciences was founded in 1971.\nWith more than 12,000 students, which are divided into five faculties, it is one of the bigger universities in Germany.
This app was created as part of a bachelor thesis. Every diagnosis is only a suggestion and does not have to be right.

If you find any bugs, mistakes or have suggestions to make the app more efficient, feel free to send an email.
We are really looking forward to get your feedback.

 Developer:
 Kevin Stowers
 RheinMain University of Applied Sciences

This tab is about the project. If you find bugs, feel free to send an email. In order to do this you just have to push the button on the bottom. \n\nDo you want to see the instruction on the next start again?
In this tab you can see every patient\'s file. In order to do so you have to enter the respective patient\'s id. \n\nDo you want to see this instruction next time again?
